name: 翁立美
objective:
目的：透過課程讓學生了解西洋古典音樂在浪漫時期(1820-1900)的歌劇與歌樂作品，培養同學對於音樂的興趣，開拓休閒生活。
This course will focus on Romantic’s vocal music and operas of the Western music.  By studying, students will enjoy those repertoires and reflect to their life. This course will also enhance students’ interest of musical arts and create a high-quality life of living.
內容：介紹浪漫時期的歌劇與歌樂作品，包括劇情、歌詞、時代背景，藉以反映現實生活，紓解同學生活壓力。
